All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicModel  
    BoardConfiguration
    Data object to store the number of rows, columns, and bombs for a game of Bomb Vacuum.
    BombVacuumController
    The controller for running a game of Bomb Vacuum.
    Controller
    Handles the communications between a View and Model
    DefaultBoard  
    GameOverState  
    GUI
    The GUI Controller responsible for user interaction.
    HighScore
    SHOULD be implemented as an immutable data object that stores a name and a time in milliseconds.
    HighScores
    Implementation should store HighScores to be passed to a View to show the user.
    InvalidStateException
    SHOULD be thrown when the state of the game does not support the operation called.
    Model
    The base for a model controller, in the MVC paradigm, to play a game of Bomb Vacuum.
    Position
    A Data Object that stores a row and column of a tile.
    SimpleHighScore  
    Tile  
    TileAction  
    TileState  
    TileStatus  
    TileValue  
    Timer
    Tracks total time that has passed collectively between start and stops.
    View
    Handles displaying the state of the game to the user.
    ViewContainer
    Holds an instance of a View.
